comment._content: This perspective shows how large the "cars" really are.  This is some unbelievably intricate engineering.  The bicycle-type spokes would keep the weight of the wheel manageable.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Interesting comment, Michael Jon - Goodyear was a world traveler and he took all these photographs so he could share them back home (here, at the Brooklyn Museum) with all his colleagues.  Often, when I look at these, I sort of feel the same way you do.  -shelley
